summary: This is an email chain between federal prosecutors discussing the need for a summary of forfeiture options regarding Jeffrey Epstein, sent the day after Epstein's death in custody.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.context: US Attorney for the Southern District of New York requesting a summary of forfeiture options regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Forfeiture options discussion planned
events.description: Geoffrey Berman requests a summary of forfeiture options regarding Jeffrey Epstein to be ready by Thursday morning.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 14, 2019, the day after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
US Attorney Geoffrey Berman is actively seeking forfeiture options regarding Epstein's assets.
The communication indicates ongoing legal proceedings concerning Epstein's estate following his death.
